name: Sanji
effect: When this Character is K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [On Play] Return up to 1 Character with 5000 base power or less to the owner's hand.
